Bag.description: A bag. Somebody must have left in a hurry...

Red Scarf.description: A scarf found at the crime scene. Its colour is suspiciously similar to the colour of blood.

Knife.description: A knife that was left near the crime scene.

Inhaler.description: An inhaler left at the crime scene.

Hockey Stick.description: A hockey stick belonging to the university hockey club.

Glasses.description: A pair of glasses that were found by another detective at the crime scene.

Erotic Novel.description: An erotic novel the killer left behind. At least now we know that they have terrible taste

Energy Drink.description: An empty can of energy drink. Not many people drink this brand.

Dark Hair.description: A dark hair from from the crime scene.

Cricket Bat.description: A cricket bat, but no cricket ball in sight... hmm...

Car Keys.description: A set of car keys left at the crime scene by the killer.

Broken Mobile Phone.description: A broken mobile phone. Perhaps somebody will recognise it.

Big Footprint.description: A big footprint left at the crime scene by the killer.

Right-Handed Fountain Pen.description: A bloodstained fountain pen. The killer must be right-handed.
